name: Crazy Bounce
description:
Crazy Bounce is a fast-paced physics arcade game where you control a Green Puck, must collect Yellow Stars and avoid bouncing Red Balls that will try to hinder you. This intuitive premise is transformed across three different modes: Classic, Carnival and Stardust, each of which have their own twists on the mechanic.

Controls (Mouse/Touch)

- Tap: Press a Button

- Hold + Drag: Move the Green Puck

Built using assets from OpenGameArt.org.
